content: this legal document explains how the property is divided between two parties mr re and spouses rml and se mr re owns a 12 share of two garages located in municipality numana the document describes the garages in detail including their size and cadastral income it then assigns one garage to mr re and the other garage to the spouses the value of each share is specified all parties involved including the notary have signed the document to confirm their agreement to the division of the property
